import React, { useState, useEffect}from 'react'; import {Link, Redirect, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import { isAuthenticated } from '../auth'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { fetchRecord } from '../actions/index'; import './css/style.css'; import fb from '../images/facebook.png'; import twitter from '../images/twitter.png'; import logo from '../images/Logo.png'; class Header extends React.Component { state = { redirect: false, search:'' } handleChange = e => { // setSearch(e.target.value) this.setState({search:e.target.value}) } handleSearch = (event) => { const { search,redirect } = this.state; event.preventDefault(); this.setState({redirect:!redirect}) console.log(search); this.props.dispatch(fetchRecord(search)); // console.log(fashion); } render() { const { redirect,search } = this.state; if (this.props.fashion && this.props.fashion.length > 0) { if (redirect) { return (

) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { // console.log(state.products[1]); return { fashion:state.products[1] } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header);
